text: I love the institution of marriage, and I love my marriage.
author: Kyle Chandler

text: I think that sense of humor is important in marriage. A sense of humor gets people through marriage.
author: Kyle Chandler

text: My grandparents got married at a very young age, and a lot of what I think about marriage is based on their relationship. I watched them over the years and saw how they dealt with everything together, as a team.
author: Kyle Chandler
